name: Whitey White Hubby Requested Sandwich Loaf
description: A super light and fluffy white sandwich loaf. Great for everyday sandwiches and toast. vegan recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/4 cup (60ml) water and add sugar and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/4 cup (60ml) water and add sugar and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add in 2 cups (250g) bread flour and 2 cups (250g) all purpose flour and salt. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add in 2 cups (250g) bread flour and 2 cups (250g) all purpose flour and salt. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oil , orange juice, water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oil , orange juice, water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)

recipeInstructions.text: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down and knead for a minute. Shape into loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under. Use flour on hands to avoid dough sticking to hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down and knead for a minute. Shape into loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under. Use flour on hands to avoid dough sticking to hands.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a damp kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 35 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a damp kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 35 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing. I usually place the cooled bread in the refrigerator for half an our before slicing with an electric knife for nice and clean slices!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing. I usually place the cooled bread in the refrigerator for half an our before slicing with an electric knife for nice and clean slices!

keywords: everyday bread recipe, vegan bread recipe, white bread recipe
